project_descr: Institutional Support to the Regional Hub of Civil Service in Astana to assist in increasing the effectiveness of civil service in the countries of the region and beyond

outputs.output_descr: The mission of the Hub is to assist in increasing the effectiveness of civil service in the countries of the region and beyond.

document_name: Project document "Institutional support of the Regional Hub of Civil Service in Astana"

Development and introduction of a Common Framework of Competencies, testing programmes for assessing competencies and determining the level of commitment to the values of the civil service for the Corps B administrative civil service positions of the RoK
Development, introduction and implementation of a factor and point scale (grading) system
International consultancy to provide substantive support to the Regional Hub of Civil Service in Astana and to other UNDP Governance Projects
International Expert on ?DETERMINATION OF KEY APPROACHES FOR ASSESSING THE EFFECTIVENESS OF POLITICAL CIVIL SERVANTS ACTIVITY AND THEIR PERFORMANCE-BASED PAYMENT?
International expert on METHODOLOGY IMPROVEMENT FOR ASSESSING THE EFFECTIVENESS OF ADMINISTRATIVE CIVIL SERVANTS ACTIVITY AND THEIR PERFORMANCE-BASED PAYMENT

RFP for two lots: Lot 1: Development and introduction of a Common Framework of Competencies (Competencies Model), Lot 2: Development and introduction of a factor and point scale (grading system) and determination of pay scales for Corps A and B.
project_title: inst. support of reg hub of civil service in astana city
